ProductSurcharge.name: ProductSurcharge
ProductSurcharge.description: Represents an association between a product and a surcharge.

EffectiveFromDate.description: The date when the product surcharge becomes active.

EffectiveToDate.description: The date when the product surcharge becomes inactive.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the product surcharge is active (true) or not (false).

IsProrationAllowed.description: Indicates whether the product surcharge is eligible for proration (true) or not (false).

IsRefundAllowed.description: Indicates whether the product surcharge is eligible for a refund (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the product surcharge.

ProductPath.description: A path containing the product IDs that roll up to the parent product.

ProductRelatedComponentId.description: The product related component associated with the product surcharge.

RuleApiName.description: The API name of the rule that's used to trigger the surcharge.

SurchargeId.description: The surcharge associated with the product surcharge.

TaxTreatmentId.description: The tax treatment associated with the product surcharge.
